examples.example: 我买了一本非常有趣的书，它让我沉浸其中，收获了很多快乐。

translate.english: I bought a very interesting book, which made me immersed in it and gained a lot of happiness.

examples.example: 我今天读了一本很有意义的书，让我对人生有了新的感悟。

translate.english: I read a very meaningful book today, which made me have a new perception of life.

examples.example: 我送给朋友一本精美的相册，希望能记录下我们美好的回忆。

translate.english: I gave a friend a beautiful photo album, hoping to record our wonderful memories.
